DataElement.preferredName: Patient Blood Pressure Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Ind-2
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no indicator related to blood pressure assessment to determine clinical trial eligibility for a patient.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Blood Pressure Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Blood Pressure assessment to determine clinical trial eligibility for a patient.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Blood Pressure Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: The pressure of the circulating blood against the walls of the blood vessels.:Elements of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

Concepts.definition: The pressure of the circulating blood against the walls of the blood vessels.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

DataElementConcept.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Changed from CTEP to COG for by script Thu Jan 2 10:00:57 EST 2014

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Does patient have blood press
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have blood pressure that meets the indicated criteria

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have hemodynamic parameters defined as systolic blood pressure less than 140 mmHg and diastolic blood pressure less than 90 mmHg?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have low resting systolic blood pressure < 90 mmHg?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have adequate blood pressure?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF COG TEXT3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have adequate blood pressure control?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have a blood pressure that is less than or equal to the 95th percentile for age, height, and gender at the time of enrollment (with or without the use of antihypertensive medications)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have evidence of hemodynamic instability?
